abstract: the ecs peer to peer tutoring program .
article: caitlin franco cofounded equality charter school in the bronx , new york , in 2009 . as executive director of the school , caitlin franco is tasked with managing all aspects of administration , programming , and strategic planning . ecs provides students with a variety of services and programs designed to enhance their educational experiences . among these services is the ecs peer to peer tutoring program , which pairs some of the brightest high school sophomores with freshmen students in need of academic support . the program is mutually beneficial , allowing freshmen to receive individualized attention from instructors they can communicate with and relate to on a more personal level , while sophomores are afforded the chance to experience educational materials in a new light .

furthermore , the ecs peer to peer tutoring program is a welcome addition to students ' college resumes . for a more in depth look at the program and other student services , please visit ecs online at www . equalitycharterschool . org .
